List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 OLVListItem (object rowObject)
 Create a OLVListItem for the given row object.
 OLVListItem (object rowObject, string text, Object image)
 Create a OLVListItem for the given row object, represented by the given string and image.

Properties

object RowObject [get, set]
 RowObject is the model object that is source of the data for this list item.
int DisplayIndex [get, set]
 DisplayIndex is the index of the row where this item is displayed. For flat lists, this is the same as ListViewItem.Index, but for grouped views, it is different.
Object ImageSelector [get, set]
 Get or set the image that should be shown against this item.

Detailed Description

also know the image they should draw against themselves

int BrightIdeasSoftware.OLVListItem.DisplayIndex [get, set]

DisplayIndex is the index of the row where this item is displayed. For flat lists, this is the same as ListViewItem.Index, but for grouped views, it is different.

Definition at line 2022 of file ObjectListView.cs.

Object BrightIdeasSoftware.OLVListItem.ImageSelector [get, set]

Get or set the image that should be shown against this item.

This can be an Image, a string or an int. A string or an int will be used as an index into the small image list.
